title: 中譯英 9 (暗爽)
originalSentence: 我在心中暗暗的感到有點暗爽。 (談論某人被解僱)
improvedSentences: I secretly felt a little bit of guilty pleasure (schadenfreude) about it.
Deep down, I was kind of gleeful about it, even if I feel a bit bad saying so.
reasonEn: 此為中文表述的英文翻譯參考。 / This is an English translation reference for the Chinese expression.
